RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 1 1 1/16M Inner turf CR: 80. Maiden Special Weight Purse 136500. INNER TURF (PURSE $105,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $23,751 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WEIGH THE RISKS was caught four wide on the first turn then rated on the outside, made a bid in the four path on the far turn, floated five into upper stretch, drifted in several paths while put to a right-handed crop outside the furlong marker, came in closer to the runner-up while battling outside that foe and shadowing that rival inward nearing the furlong marker but avoided contact, was straightened by the rider inside that marker, drifted in again under a right-handed crop late and carried the runner-up in then narrowly prevailed. APPELLATE went three wide on the first turn, tracked the pace on the outside, made a bid with three furlongs to run, came under a drive in upper stretch, was shadowed in then carried in by the winner coming to the furlong marker, fought on gamely inside that foe into the final sixteenth, was carried in again late and just missed while narrowly able to hold the place. LATER DARLING was off slow and spotted the front a few lengths, tugged hard on the bit while inside on the first turn, was reserved off the pace, moved from the rail to the three path while let out on the far turn, was roused five wide into the stretch, rallied outside in the final furlong and finished fast but was too late while clear for the show. SENSING FLATTER went three to four wide on the first turn, was reserved on the outside without the benefit of cover, came under encouragement while three then four wide on the far turn, turned into upper stretch under a drive, chased into the final furlong and lacked the needed kick. JUSTDENY was taken under a tight hold early then tugged keenly on the bit, was reserved in the two to three path, came under urging on the far turn and lacked the needed response. ICE COLD moved in at the rear early, was unhurried at the back, went three then four wide on the far turn, came six wide into the stretch and failed to threaten. STENTS AND STATINS (GB) broke in then was corrected by the rider, settled along the hedge, was urged along on the far turn and failed to rally. PROGENY went to the front, showed the way on the on the inside, was asked outside the quarter-pole, lost the advantage under a drive in upper stretch and gave way. PHILANTHROPY was rated in the two path, dropped back under coaxing with three furlongs to run and failed to respond. MOST OF ALL was taken under restraint early, steadied while rank off heels on the first turn, was rated off the pace while leveling out some on the backstretch, traveled in the two path while asked on the far turn, chased into upper stretch and came up empty. FOLLOWING THE RACE, THE RIDER OF APPELLATE CLAIMED FOUL AGAINST THE WINNER ALLEGING INTERFERENCE IN THE STRETCH. AFTER THE STEWARDS' REVIEW, NO CHANGE WAS MADE TO THE ORDER OF FINISH

ENTRY.NAME: Stents and Statins (GB)
ENTRY.OWNER: Bridlewood Farm Madaket Stables LLC Dubb Michael and Kisber Michael E
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in,corrected,settled inside,urged 2nd turn,no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Justdeny
ENTRY.OWNER: West Paces Racing LLC Pine Racing Stables and R A Hill Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: tight hold,keen,2-3p1st,reserved,ask3w2nd,failed to rally

ENTRY.NAME: Most of All
ENTRY.COMMENT: rank 1st turn,stdy off heels,rated ins-2p,ask2nd turn,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Progeny
ENTRY.COMMENT: ins1st,clear pace,ins2nd,ask outside1/4,headed3/16,gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Later Darling
ENTRY.OWNER: J and J Stables LLC It's All About The Girls Stable LLC Braverman Paul and Pinch
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow,hard held rail1st,pulled,rsrvd,ins-3w2nd,5w1/4,rallied

ENTRY.NAME: Philanthropy
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated 2path,dropped back 3/8,failed to respond

ENTRY.NAME: Appellate
ENTRY.OWNER: Medallion Racing Aldabbagh Omar CMNWLTH Stanton Mark Rhoades Lennie and Fowler B
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w1st,tracked outside,bid3/8,3p2nd,ask1/4,dueld,carried in,denied

ENTRY.NAME: Weigh the Risks
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w1st,rated out,bid 4p2nd,5p,drift in1/8,drift in 1/16,dueled,up

ENTRY.NAME: Sensing Flatter
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3-4w1st,reserved outside,no cover,ask3-4w2nd,lacked needed kick

ENTRY.NAME: Ice Cold
ENTRY.COMMENT: mvd in early,2p1st,at rear,3-4w2nd,6w into lane,no threat

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 2 7F Dirt CR: 69. Maiden Claiming Purse 43000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $30,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwi se Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BON ADIEU established the front and showed the way in hand along the inside coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, took the inside route into upper stretch, dug in under a drive holding well and safe to the finish kept to task. MIM led early on before prompting the pace three wide outside the top pair, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, continued three wide into upper stretch, drifted out two paths straightened away, ran on to chase the winner home well clear of the rest and along second best. EMBRACEABLE GAL chased four wide under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, tipped four to five wide into upper stretch, improved position to secure the show honors. SWEET LIBERTY pressed the pace just off the inside between foes coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide for home, weakened in the final eighth. FOLLOW THE FED chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled six wide into upper stretch, weakened. MARLEY'S GHOST coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside under coaxing from the three-eighths, angled four wide into upper stretch, tired. LADY FORTUNA chased five wide under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, angled out seven to eight wide into upper stretch, made no impact. NORTHWAY six paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung five wide into upper stretch and tired. SCHERZER pulled along the inside eager early on and off heels just off the pace, tipped two then three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, cornered just off the inside into upper stretch and faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Marley's Ghost
ENTRY.OWNER: Taste Of Victory Stables LLC Maslowski Frank and Youngblood Paul
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased ins, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Follow the Fed
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-2w, coaxed 5/16, angled 6w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Bon Adieu
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand ins, coaxed near 1/4, ins 1/4, dug in, held well

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Lady Sheila Stable, Edition Farm & Reilly McDonald

ENTRY.NAME: Scherzer
ENTRY.COMMENT: eager inside early, coaxed 3w 3/8, 2w 1/4p, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Fortuna
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 5w, coaxed 5/16, angled 7-8w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Liberty
ENTRY.OWNER: Thummps Racing Stable LLC Jacoutot Peter and Paradise Farms Corp
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2p betw, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, weakened final furlong

ENTRY.NAME: Northway
ENTRY.OWNER: Blue Bison Stable and Hoffman Thoroughbreds
ENTRY.COMMENT: 6w backstretch, 3w turn, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Mim
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted 3w, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, drifted, ran on, second best

ENTRY.NAME: Embraceable Gal
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4w, coaxed 5/16, 4-5w upper, improved

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 3 1 1/8M Dirt CR: 103. Allowance Purse 149500. (PURSE $115,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $26,013 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non -winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FILM STAR was hustled to the front, went around the first turn in the two path, showed the way down the backstretch, vied inside to the two path on the far turn, responded well when set down in upper stretch, was given one pop of a right-handed crop at the furlong marker then switched to a left-handed crop, drifted out some inside the sixteenth-pole then was straightened by the rider and proved best under steady handling. LEADING CONTENDER saved ground on the first turn, was well placed just off the pace, came under urging in the two path on the far turn, was driven three wide into the stretch, pursued the winner in the drive and earned the place. SAQEEL broke out then was hustled, went three wide on the first turn, stalked the pace on the outside, was asked in the three path on the far turn, came four wide at the quarter-pole, lost touch with the winner in upper stretch, drifted out some near the furlong marker and missed the place while well clear for the show. OLYMPIC DREAMS started the first turn in the two path then shifted four wide, settled on the outside, was roused four wide on the far turn and failed to respond. THE PRINCE'S SPUR bobbled slightly at the start then brushed with a foe and dropped back, went four wide on the first turn, settled towards the rear, was urged five then four wide on the far turn, dropped to the three path into upper stretch and capitulated. MOORE'S LAW was last away then taken up and clipped heels, dropped well behind while saving ground and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Leading Contender
ENTRY.COMMENT: ins1st,well placed,ask2p2nd turn,3path1/4,chased,no match

ENTRY.NAME: Moore's Law
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away,taken up,clipped heels,well behind,ins turns,trailed

ENTRY.NAME: The Prince's Spur
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled bit brk,brushed,drop back,4-5wide turns,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Olympic Dreams
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2-4p1st,settled outside,roused 4w2nd turn,no response

ENTRY.NAME: Film Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,2p1st,showed way,ins-2p2nd,ask1/4,responded,clear

ENTRY.NAME: Saqeel
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,hustled,3p1st,stlkd outside,ask3p2nd turn,4p1/4,miss2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 97. Claiming Purse 42000. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Maiden And Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAGNOLIA MIDNIGHT coaxed from the gate, vied three then two wide early on before shaking away to a safe lead midway down the backstretch just off the inside, continued in the two path through the far turn patiently handled and swung four wide into upper stretch, got set down nearing the eighth pole and drew off under a drive to prevail. DURKIN'S CALL chased along the inside and then just off the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled out six wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild kick. BOSSMAKINBOSSMOVES broke out at the start bumping BEAVER HAT, chased two to three wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, angled six wide into upper stretch, kicked on belatedly to secure the show honors. INVISIBLE WAR chased four wide under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, tipped five wide into upper stretch, kept on to the finish. SPRINKLEHEAD vied inside early on before being shaken off a bit and tipped out to the three path five furlongs from home, came under coaxing at he three-eighths in closest aim of the leader, angled five wide into upper stretch and weakened. HANG TIGHT chased just off the inside detached at the tail of the field, came under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, went six wide into upper stretch and passed tired rivals. HAMMERIN AAMER chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled out six to seven wide into upper stretch and offered no response. BEAVER HAT got bumped at the start by BOSSMAKINBOSSMOVES, came under hustling and chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch and made no impact. RALLY SQUIRREL coaxed from the start, vied early on between foes before giving chase three then four wide, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung six wide into upper stretch, faltered, and was eased home to the finish. SILVER DUST bobbled at the break, chased just off the inside early on before tucking inside midway down the backstretch, came under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths along the rail, cornered two to three wide into upper stretch beginning to back away, took an awkward step in behind straightened away into upper stretch, the rider peering back over his left shoulder immediately placing his charge to a protective hold while choppy gaited, got eased up and was allowed to drift out through to the finish, then walked off under his own power.

ENTRY.NAME: Durkin's Call
ENTRY.OWNER: Grab Gary and Chief Big Blue Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased ins, coaxed 2p 3/8, angled 6w upper, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Invisible War
ENTRY.OWNER: Grab Gary and Chief Big Blue Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4w, coaxed 7/16, 5w upper, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Silver Dust
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled st, chased ins, 2-3w uppr, choppy 3/16, protected, eased

ENTRY.NAME: Sprinklehead
ENTRY.OWNER: Corms Racing Stable and On The Rise Again Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied ins early, to 3p 5/8, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Hang Tight
ENTRY.COMMENT: detached at rear 2p, coaxed 7/16, 6w upper, passed tired foes

ENTRY.NAME: Rally Squirrel
ENTRY.COMMENT: coax st, vied, chase 3-4w, coaxed 3/8, 6w uppr, faltered, eased

ENTRY.NAME: Hammerin Aamer
ENTRY.OWNER: Beast Mode Racing LLC and America's Pastime Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-3w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, angled 6-7w upper, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Magnolia Midnight
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, vied 2p early, shook away, 4w upper, drew off

ENTRY.NAME: Bossmakinbossmoves
ENTRY.OWNER: Clear Stars Stable and Mitre Box Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased 2-3w, coaxed 3/8, 6w upper, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Beaver Hat
ENTRY.OWNER: Royal Steed Racing and Scott Ryan C
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped, hustled st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, no impact

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 5 5 1/2F Turf CR: 78. Maiden Special Weight Purse 83000. (UP TO $14,442 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (For Horses That Sold or RNA for $50,000 Or Less In Their Most Recent Sale). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Five and One Half Furlongs on the Main Track).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COWES ducked in sharply at the start, moved up while tugging hard on the bit under restraint then was rated just off the pace, drafted inside on the turn, was roused four wide into the stretch, rallied outside to get the lead at the eighth-pole, fought outside the game runner-up to the finish and proved best under good handling. NANO MAN was sent hard from the start, rushed up to set the pace under pressure to his outside, vied along the hedge on the turn, shook clear under a drive into upper stretch, lost the lead to the winner at the furlong marker, fought on determinedly to the finish but missed while well clear the place in a good effort. PICCATA PRINCE was hustled from the gate then urged along on the outside, chased three wide on the turn, moved out in upper stretch and lacked the needed kick while able to get the show. MAGIC BEACH came outward at the start then bumped with a foe, was well placed off the pace, went around the turn in the two path, was asked outside the five-sixteenths, moved out in upper stretch and also lacked the needed kick. UNCLE EDDIE broke out and hit the gate then bumped with a foe, settled at the rear, rounded the turn in the three path and failed to threaten. MY MAN WOODY bumped with a rival at the start, was urged along off the pace, dropped back leaving the backstretch, went two then three wide on the turn, came five wide into the stretch, moved in near the furlong marker and was no factor. SUGAR IT'S ELI was hustled from the gate, pressed the pace on the outside, vied in the three path on the turn, spun five wide into the stretch and tired. KHANATE pressed the pace on the outside of the leader while loosely between foes, vied in the two path on the turn, was given his cue inside the five-sixteenths, dropped back into upper stretch and came up empty. NOTAFRAIDTOCHARGE bumped with a rival while last away, tucked in behind foes while off the pace, went two then three wide on the turn, spun four wide into the stretch, remained on his inside lead until inside the furlong marker then swapped to the proper lead and was no factor. ATTRAYANT was urged along towards the rear, went three then four wide on the turn, came six wide into the stretch and failed to impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Notafraidtocharge
ENTRY.OWNER: Mercurio Matthew J Cotrone Robert and Rodriguez Rudy R
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,last away,tucked in,2-3p turn,4w1/4,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Cowes
ENTRY.COMMENT: duck in sharply brk,pulld,keen,ratd,ins,4w1/4,rally,lead1/8,best

ENTRY.OWNER: America's Pastime Stables Zaro Jerold L Denholtz Stables Sleeping Giant Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent hard,pace ins foes,hedge turn,clear3/16,headed1/8,fought on

ENTRY.NAME: Attrayant
ENTRY.OWNER: Lerman Roy S and Kirkwood Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: urged along,3-4wide turn,6w into lane,no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Magic Beach
ENTRY.COMMENT: came out brk,bmpd,well placed,2p turn,ask5/16,mvd out3/16,no kick

ENTRY.NAME: My Man Woody
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmp brk,urged along,drop back 7/16,2-3p,5p1/4,mvd in1/8,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Khanate
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace,2path turn,asked ins5/16,drop back 3/16,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Uncle Eddie
ENTRY.OWNER: Deeb Dennis L and Seery Terence V
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,hit gate,bmpd,at rear,3path turn,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Piccata Prince
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,urged outside,chased 3w turn,mvd out 3/16,no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Sugar It's Eli
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,pressed outside,vied 3path turn,5p into lane,tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 6 7F Dirt CR: 80. Maiden Special Weight Purse 136500. (PURSE $105,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $23,751 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ALPINE PRINCESS coaxed from the gate, chased five to six paths off the inside down the backstretch before tucking four wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, went eight wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive rallying inside the final furlong to issue a challenge a sixteenth out, dug in and was just up over a trio latched on at the finish. NIKITIS coaxed from the start, chased four paths off the inside down the backstretch and then just off the inside through the turn under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, swung five wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command from the top pair a sixteenth out while under threat to the outside, dug in and was nailed on the wire. CAITLINHERGRTNESS dueled from the five path down the backstretch and then the two path through the turn with SNOW DANCE to her inside, got set down spinning three to four wide into upper stretch, dug in clinging to command over a trio until collared a sixteenth out, then fought on to the finish latched on the preserve the show honors. SNOW DANCE dueled from the two path with the aforementioned foe to her outside, tucked inside through the turn coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, got let out taking the inside route at that station, dug in under a drive latched on the leader battling through the stretch to the finish the innermost of a quarter and was along for the last major share. SCALABLE coaxed from the gate, chased six paths off the inside down the backstretch and then three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, swung five to six wide into upper stretch, weakened in the late stages. GENETICS brushed the near side stall at the start, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch, offered up a bid a furlong out, then flattened out in the late stages. NORISKIT NOBISCUIT reluctant to load prior to the start, chased six to seven paths off the inside down the backstretch and then three wide through the turn coaxed along from the seven-sixteenths, swung five wide into upper stretch and offered no response. EXTREMELY GRUNTLED chased five paths off the inside down the backstretch before tucking to the two path through the turn getting placed to coaxing at the three-eighths, continued just off the inside into upper stretch and weakened. DANCING DEAN broke a beat slow, then chased just off the inside a bit sluggish early on, tucked inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, went five to six wide into upper stretch and made no impact. SOCIAL AFFAIR coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside in range of the front, came under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths and retreated through the turn before swinging four wide into upper stretch, got placed to a protective hold and was eased home to the finish well behind, then walked off under her own power.

ENTRY.NAME: Social Affair
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased ins, retreated turn, 4w uppr, protected, eased

ENTRY.NAME: Genetics
ENTRY.COMMENT: brush gate, chased 3-2w, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, flattened out

ENTRY.NAME: Dancing Dean
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke beat slw, chased 2p, coaxed ins 7/16, 5-6w uppr, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Alpine Princess
ENTRY.OWNER: Full of Run Racing Two and Madaket Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, 5-6w backstretch, 4w turn, 8w upper, dug in, just up

ENTRY.NAME: Nikitis
ENTRY.OWNER: Schermerhorn Richard Team Hanley and Thirty Year Farm
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 4-2w, coaxed 5/16, 5w upper, up 1/16, nailed

ENTRY.NAME: Extremely Gruntled
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w backstretch, coaxed 2p 3/8, 2w 1/4p, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Snow Dance
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2p, inside turn, let out inside 1/4, battled on

ENTRY.NAME: Noriskit Nobiscuit
ENTRY.COMMENT: 6-7w backstretch, 3w turn, coaxed 7/16, 5w upper, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Caitlinhergrtness
ENTRY.OWNER: Siena Farm LLC and WinStar Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 5p, 2p turn, 3-4w upper, dug in, headed 1/16, fought on

ENTRY.NAME: Scalable
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, 6w backstretch, 3w turn, 5-6w upper, wknd late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 7 1 1/8M Inner turf CR: 95. Starter Allowance Purse 70000. INNER TURF (UP TO $12,180 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $50,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN OR CLAIMING. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: INDIAN MISCHIEF strolled to the front, raced inside to the two path on the first turn, showed the way with an easy lead, was asked with three furlongs to run, vied inside under a bit of extra left-rein pressure on the second turn, responded well when put to a strong hand-ride in upper stretch, came under a right-handed crop at the furlong marker and held under steady urging. LORD FLINTSHIRE rounded the first turn in the two path, was rated just off the pace, drafted inside on the far turn, was put to a drive in upper stretch, chased the winner while just behind that foe into the final furlong, continued to pursue that foe to the finish and earned the place. HARRY HOOD leaned out at the start, was taken under a tight hold early, stalked the pace on the outside in the two to three path, made a bid with three furlongs to run, was asked for his best in upper stretch, chased between horses into the final furlong and lacked the needed kick but earned the show. EMPIRE ATTRACTION moved out under tight restraint early, raced in the three path on the first turn, was reserved on the outside but with cover, went three wide while let out on the far turn, pursued the winner while outside in the stretch and also lacked the needed kick then missed the show. BORN A GAMBLER was in tight after the start then taken under a strong hold, rounded the first turn in the two path, was reserved on the outside bit with cover, went two then three wide on the far turn, was roused four wide into the stretch and lacked the needed response. JARREAU saved ground on the first turn, lagged at the rear, moved from the hedge to the three path on the far turn, came five wide into the stretch and failed to threaten. SKI PATROL came outward after the start then was corrected by the rider, saved ground on the first turn, settled off the pace, raced inside to the two path on the far turn and faltered. ALL TIMES WERE HAND-TIMED DUE TO A TIMING ISSUE AND PROVIDED BY THE NYRA STEWARD

ENTRY.NAME: Jarreau
ENTRY.COMMENT: ins1st turn,lagged at rear,ins-3w2nd turn,5w1/4,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Ski Patrol
ENTRY.COMMENT: came out after brk,ins1st,settled,ins-2p2nd,faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Born a Gambler
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight after brk,tight hold,2p1st,reservd,2-3p2nd,4w1/4,no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Empire Attraction
ENTRY.OWNER: Averill Racing LLC and Two Eight Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: mvd out early,3p1st,rated out,3w2nd,lacked needed kick

ENTRY.NAME: Lord Flintshire
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p1st,rated just off pace,ins2nd,ask1/4,chased,earned 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Indian Mischief
ENTRY.COMMENT: to front,ins-2p1st,easy lead,ask7/16,ins2nd,responded,held drvng

ENTRY.NAME: Harry Hood
ENTRY.COMMENT: tight hold,3p1st,stlkd outside,bid3/8,2p2nd,chasd btwn1/8,outkckd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 8 1 1/8M Turf CR: 85. Starter Allowance Purse 70000. (UP TO $12,180 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $50,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN OR CLAIMING. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile and One Eighth on the Main Track).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CAN'T FOOL ME two to three wide through the first turn, chased two to three wide before tipping out four wide through the far turn coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, got set down spinning four wide into upper stretch and was carried out a path straightened away, rallied to take command a furlong from home, edged away under a drive in the late stages to prevail. DIAMOND STATUS got brushed at the start by MISS KRISTY due to pressure from RIVER TAY, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing near the quarter pole and seizing command, swung three wide into upper stretch, drifted out a path straightened away carrying the aforementioned foe outwards, dug in under threat and was collared a furlong from home, ran on to preserve the place honors. MISS KRISTY got bumped at the start by RIVER TAY and in turn brushed the aforementioned foe, chased along the inside through the first turn and then four then three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, went eight wide into upper stretch and kicked on belatedly to secure the show honors. MISCREANT tracked the front along the inside from near the rear of the field, tipped to the two path through the far turn coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, angled four wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild kick. ANILEATE two to three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled seven wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild bid. DONTMESSWITHTESS fractious in the gate prior to the start attempting to rush the stall door, settled very briefly and then tossed her head when the latch was sprung getting caught unprepared for the break and was away a beat and a half after the field and conceded five lengths to the front despite light coaxing, took the opportunity to cross directly to the two path and saved ground through the opening bend, then chased four then three wide down the backstretch and through the far turn coming under coaxing three furlongs from home, angled six wide into upper stretch, stayed on one paced through to the finish. EXCEPT TEMPTATION chased just off the inside until tucked inside into the far turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch, offered up a bid a furlong out, then flattened out in the late stages. RIVER TAY (IRE) broke out at the start bumping MISS KRISTY into DIAMOND STATUS, chased along the inside, angled out set down five wide into upper stretch, weakened in the drive. UP HER SLEEVE tracked the pace along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, weakened. SISTER NELL chased three wide under a ride from the five-sixteenths, angled four wide into upper stretch, weakened. FAST KIMMIE chased three then two wide coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, went six wide into upper stretch, tired. MOULY showed the way in hand along the inside, got headed for command nearing the quarter pole and took the inside route into upper stretch and stopped while not persevered with to the finish.

ENTRY.NAME: River Tay (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased inside, set down 5w upper, weakened

ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked ins, coaxed 2p near 1/4, angled 4w upper, mild kick

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-2w, coaxed near 1/4, 6w upper, tired

ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w pursuit, coaxed 5/16, angled 4w upper, weakened

ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, weakened

ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand ins, headed near 1/4, ins 1/4, stopped

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed ins 3/8, 3w upper, bid, flattened out

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Kristy
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, ins 1st turn, chased 4-3w, 8w upper, belatedly

ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed st, chased 3-2w, up near 1/4, 3w upper, collared, ran on

ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious gate, tossed head st, chased 3-4w, 6w upper, one paced

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Spinaway S. - Grade1 SARATOGA RACE 9 7F Dirt CR: 93. Stakes Purse 300000. FOR FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Non-Lasix race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) not permitted within 48 hours of post time. By subscription of $300 each which should accompany the nomination; $1,500 to pass the entry box and an additional $1,500 to start. For hors es not originally nominated, a supplemental payment of $1,500 in addition to the entry and starting fees may be made at any time prior to the closing of entries. The Spinaway has been selected as a Breeders' Cup Dirt Dozen Bonus Series Race for the $2 Mil lion NetJets Breeders' Cup Juvenile Fillies on November 3, 2023 at Santa Anita Park. The nominated winner of the Spinaway will receive a credit of $30,000 toward entry fees into the Breeders' Cup Juvenile Fillies, second place will receive a $15,000 credi t toward entry fees and third place will receive $7,500 credit toward entry fees. The purse to be divided 55% to the winner, 20% to second, 12% to third, 6% to fourth, 4% to fifth and 3% divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. Weight 122 lbs. Non
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BRIGHTWORK established forward position on the outside, had WAYS AND MEANS clip her heels inside the three-quarter pole, stalked the leader on the outside, engaged the leading duo in the four path on the turn, was put to a drive into upper stretch then came under a left-handed crop, battled inside of the runner-up to the finish and prevailed under strong urging. WAYS AND MEANS broke a bit awkwardly and was off a half-step slow, raced in tight quarters while caught between foes early, was taken up while lugging out over the heels of BRIGHTWORK inside the three-quarter pole then clipped that foes heels, was rated on the outside, moved closer late on the backstretch, made a bid in the five path on the turn, turned into upper stretch on even terms for the lead, was put to a right-handed crop outside the furlong marker, dueled outside of the winner, switched to a left-handed crop near the sixteenth-pole and missed while well clear for the place. WONDER RIDE was reserved off the pace, traveled three wide on the turn, was roused outside the quarter-pole, chased into upper stretch and weakened while able to get the show. ALYS BEACH dropped back under urging, fell well behind after going five furlongs, went around the turn in the two path, moved out near the furlong marker then drifted further out and improved for the show. CLOSING ACT was eased back off the pace near the three-quarter pole then settled, raced between horses in the two path on the turn, dropped back near the five-sixteenths, spun three wide into the stretch and came up empty. SUGAR HI went to the front, showed the way under some pressure, vied inside on the turn, was urged along under heavy pressure passing the five-sixteenths, dropped back into upper stretch and gave way. LADY MOSCATO pressed the pace on the inside, was eased back near the five-eighths pole, saved ground on the turn, was given her cue near the five-sixteenths, turned into the stretch in the two path and capitulated. LEMORIAN pressed the pace on the outside, drew even with the leader in the three path on the turn, dropped back under urging outside the quarter-pole and faded. MIZ SENSE acted-up just as the gate opened, became very unruly while thrashing around in the stall then unseated rider and was declared a non-starter. FOLLOWING A STEWARDS' INQUIRY INTO THE START, MIZ SENSE WAS DECLARED A NON-STARTER

ENTRY.NAME: Miz Sense
ENTRY.OWNER: Repole Stable and St Elias Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: acted-up,unruly start,unseated rider,declared non-starter

ENTRY.COMMENT: eased back 3/4,settled,btwn turn,drop back5/16,3w1/4,empty

ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped well behind 5/8,2path turn,mvd out 1/8,drift out,up show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 10 1 1/16M Inner turf CR: 79. Maiden Claiming Purse 52000. INNER TURF (UP TO $9,048 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WHISKEY LULLABY prompted the pace of AVALANCHE IS COMIN from the outside three then two wide, got set down spinning three wide into upper stretch, took over command nearing the eighth pole, then inched away under a drive drifting out four to five paths through to the finish. DARK POOL chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, cut the corner into upper stretch, offered up a mild kick. ADDRESSABLE MARKET (IRE) chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch, kicked on belatedly to the finish. KEEP IT SEXY chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the far turn, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and offered up a mild kick. BETTER JUSTICE chased three wide coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, continued three wide into upper stretch, ran on through to the finish but was outfinished in the late stages. ROSY TOMORROWS brushed the off side stall at the start, chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild bid but was outfinished in the late going. AVALANCHE IS COMIN broke on top, then established sole command after a brief tussle with WHISKEY LULLABY, showed the way in hand along the inside coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, took the inside route into upper stretch, dug in under threat and was collared just outside the eighth pole, weakened in the final furlong. JET CITY WOMAN chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the far turn, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled four wide into upper stretch, offered no rally, and was subsequently vanned off after the finish. BELLESHAZZA chased just off the inside until tucked inside at the seven-sixteenths, got set down spinning just off the inside into upper stretch, offered no response. EXOTIC CAT chased three wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, went seven wide into upper stretch, offered no kick. SO ARE YOU chased three then two wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, angled six wide into upper stretch, made no impact. SOLEVO SPRITZ broke out at the start and was corrected, raced three then two wide through the first turn, chased three to four wide down the backstretch before tucking to the two path through the far turn, swung three wide into upper stretch and tired. MILE FRACTION WAS HAND-TIMED DUE TO A TIMING ISSUE AND PROVIDED BY THE NYRA STEWARD
